Interests

  • Parameterized verification of concurrent and distributed systems.
  • Safety verification of Neural Networks.
  • Timing Side-Channel attacks.
  • Verification of cache coherence protocols, memory consistency.
  • Verification of string manipulating programs.

Publications

A least of publications is available via Google Scholar and DBLP.
